Class BrandingService

java.lang.Object
com.qdc.lims.service.BrandingService
@Service public class BrandingService extends Object
Centralizes whitelabel branding and lab profile information.

This service reads configuration values and exposes consistent helpers for window titles, report headers, and lab contact details.

  • Method Details

    • getApplicationName

      public String getApplicationName()
      Returns:
      the application name (for example, "LIMS")

    • getLabNameRaw

      public String getLabNameRaw()
      Returns:
      the configured lab/clinic name, or an empty string if not set

    • getLabNameOrAppName

      public String getLabNameOrAppName()
      Returns:
      the lab name if present, otherwise the application name

    • getClinicAddress

      public String getClinicAddress()
      Returns:
      the configured clinic address (may be blank)

    • getClinicPhone

      public String getClinicPhone()
      Returns:
      the configured clinic phone (may be blank)

    • getClinicEmail

      public String getClinicEmail()
      Returns:
      the configured clinic email (may be blank)

    • formatWindowTitle

      public String formatWindowTitle(String context)
      Formats a window title using the lab name as a prefix.
      Parameters:
      context - a short context label (for example, "Admin Dashboard")
      Returns:
      formatted window title

    • formatDashboardTitle

      public String formatDashboardTitle(DashboardType dashboardType)
      Formats a dashboard title using the dashboard's window title context.
      Parameters:
      dashboardType - dashboard type
      Returns:
      formatted title

    • tagStage

      public void tagStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage, String context)
      Tags a stage with a branding context and applies a branded title.
      Parameters:
      stage - stage to tag
      context - context label (for example, "System Configuration")

    • refreshAllTaggedStageTitles

      public void refreshAllTaggedStageTitles()
      Reapplies branded titles to all stages that have been tagged.

    • isLabProfileComplete

      public boolean isLabProfileComplete()
      Returns:
      whether the lab profile has been completed

    • getReportHeaderText

      public String getReportHeaderText()
      Returns:
      a branded report header string

    • getReportLogoPath

      public String getReportLogoPath()
      Returns:
      configured report logo path (may be blank)

    • getReportFooterText

      public String getReportFooterText()
      Returns:
      a branded report footer string

    • getCopyrightLine

      public String getCopyrightLine()
      Returns:
      a copyright line using the current year and lab name
